outputs.name: geo
outputs.description:
The Rhino version of the Honeybee geometry object, which will be
visible in the Rhino scene.

inputs.name: _hb_objs
inputs.description:
A Honeybee Model, Room, Face, Shade, Aperture, or Door to be
previewed in the Rhino scene.

code:
try:  # import the core ladybug_{{cad}} dependencies
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.fromhoneybee import from_hb_objects
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.{{plugin}} import all_required_inputs
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import ladybug_{{cad}}:\n\t{}'.format(e))



if all_required_inputs(ghenv.Component):
    geo = from_hb_objects(_hb_objs)
name: HB Visualize All
description:
Preview any Honeybee geometry object within the Rhino scene, including all
sub-faces and assigned shades.
